extends BasePrimitive<Date>

      • setPrecision

        public void setPrecision(TemporalPrecisionEnum thePrecision)
                  throws DataFormatException
        Sets the precision for this datatype using field values from Calendar. Valid values are:
        • Calendar.SECOND
        • Calendar.DAY_OF_MONTH
        • Calendar.MONTH
        • Calendar.YEAR
        Throws:
        DataFormatException
